inputs.name: vcpkgGitURL
inputs.label: vcpkg URL Git repository:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the URL Git repositoryto download vcpkg from. Defaults to https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg.git

inputs.name: vcpkgGitCommitId
inputs.label: vcpkg Git commit id or branch:
inputs.helpMarkDown: If not specified, the default branch of the repository.[More information](https://github.com/lukka/CppBuildTasks/blob/master/README.md)

inputs.name: vcpkgTriplet
inputs.label: The vcpkg triplet:
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provides the vcpkg triplet, e.g. specify a file in the vcpkg/triplet/ directory that defines the platform/architecture/runtime/compiler to be used when building. Common values are x64-windows, x64-linux and x64-osx.
When not provided here, the task uses VCPKG_DEFAULT_TRIPLET environment variable if defined, otherwise it uses a platform specific one.

inputs.name: vcpkgArguments
inputs.label: Arguments for vcpkg (also the list of packages):
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provides the vcpkg arguments, e.g. the list of packages space separated, and additional flags like '@responsefile', '--vcpkg-root' and so forth.

messages.vcpkgNeedsRebuildMissingExecutable: Building vcpkg as executable is missing.
messages.vcpkgNeedsRebuildRepoUpdated: Building vcpkg as Git repo has been updated.

outputVariables.name: outVcpkgRootPath
outputVariables.description: After the execution of this task, this variable contains the path to the installation of vcpkg on the build server.

outputVariables.name: outvcpkgTriplet
outputVariables.description: After the execution of this task, this variable contains the triplet used when building the packages.
